name: Dr. Eleanor Vance, DVM, DACVS
title: Chief of Small Animal Surgery
bio_summary: With over 15 years of experience, Dr. Vance specializes in complex surgical procedures, including minimally invasive techniques. She leads our surgical residency program and is passionate about post-operative pain management.

name: Dr. Marcus Chen, DVM
title: Lead General Practitioner & Wellness Director
specialty: Preventive Care, Geriatric Medicine, and Nutrition
bio_summary: Dr. Chen is dedicated to lifetime wellness and preventative medicine. He excels at creating personalized nutrition plans and managing chronic conditions in senior pets, ensuring quality of life.

name: Dr. David Morales, DVM, DACVECC
title: Director of Emergency & Critical Care
specialty: Board-Certified Emergency and Critical Care Specialist
bio_summary: A calm and decisive force in emergencies, Dr. Morales manages all critical cases, from trauma and poisoning to intensive post-operative monitoring. She is available 24/7 through our E.R. unit.
